WorkItem.Description: Create a pie chart to show a site's scores. Size a score's wedge based on it's weight. Color a score's wedge based on its utility score. Put this pie chart in a window shown through a menu button. Update/redraw the window based on scoreboard changed events. Include a drop down to select which site is shown, or alternately show a pie chart for every site in the same window.
WorkItem.Summary: Add pie chart window to display weights

Comments.Message: Finished put in the pie chart to view the weights for each category.Â  Displaying the pie for ethe score for each site under each category will require a bit more development.
